Title: Track User Answers
Description: Design a system to record user answers with timestamps and correctness.
Acceptance Criteria:
User response model created with fields for User ID Question ID selected answer Correctness and timestamp
CRUD functions implemented for User responses

Title: Create crud functions and endpoints to track user responses
Description: Create crud functions and endpoints to track user responses to questions.

Title: Define user response models
Description: Update models to properly define the user response model
